showerReviews.reviewText: Please don't go to this store they don't care about there customers specially the truckers I'm sure they would like a nice hot shower but can't get one ‚Ä¶
Limited parking.. get there early. 3 outside showers. I do not recommend getting a shower here.

Didn't make it inside. No truck parking because 80 percent of the spots are dropped trailers, or bobtail. Did have a shower hut outside l, unknown functionality. Don't waste your time even trying here

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ a contractor to Pilot. Their washing machine was broken, no towels available. Translation: no shower. A contractor acting like a contractor, cutting costs over the weekend vs. getting immediate results today. Consistency is a hard image ‚Ä¶

One of best Pilot/flying-j I‚Äôve visited. Clean hot showers. I stoped in for a shower since my fresh water tank in my RV was empty. Has plenty of parking for trucks & Rvs. After my shower, I asked if I could use water to refill my small ‚Ä¶
Showers clean long wait will take your points and shower credit just to take one shower.  Had no towels and fan doesn‚Äôt work.

Signs on the door that showers are not available. Stood in line to check out and asked the male cashier why we couldn't shower. He said if we gave him a "little tip or something" he could arrange it. Also he would not take the Pilot card to ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ up behind the counter, smoking cigarettes, and watching their children run around the store. They put up a no shower sign at night and claim understaffed. Also, bathrooms were dirty when i arrived here the night before, and still are dirty ‚Ä¶
Nice cashiers here, friendly. There are about 50 truck parking spaces. There is no driver lounge or laundry room. The shower I used was clean but had no soap. Not much to do here.........

‚Ä¶ at the store to be tired and grumpy but they were very nice, very helpful,bless their heart. Store was spotless and so were the showers. Parking lot was small, access to fuel pumps was a little bit tricky, but fuel prices were good.( ‚Ä¶

The men that work here DO NOT CARE ABOUT THEIR JOB!!! Called the store before arriving to make sure that the showers were available. Upon arrival I did not shower until later in the evening because there are only three showers so I figured ‚Ä¶

A tall afro-american lady with glasses on duty Monday June 5 2023 told me the store is a Pilot only for fuel not for redeem points or take a shower.
Her costumer service was terrible. Talking on the phone for long while I waited.

Pretty small truck stop, but somewhat clean. Cant get shower through machine because they use keys. Shower was pretty big, but I was pretty frustrated with lack of shelves/hooks. There is literally one chair that you have to put all your ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: It don't matter which loves you go to there going to be a wait on fule or shower or rest room but not at t.a. and petro thay have 20 shower 15 or so fule pumps and 2 men's rooms loves you suck üëéüëé ‚Ä¶

Wish we could leave a better rating because the ladies were friendly, but the shower we paid $17 for was not clean. There is mold all in the shower. That tells me they are not cleaning. Bleach or Tilex will literally kill the mold. None of ‚Ä¶
Nice and newer (as of 10/2023). Big shower rooms and laundry with 2 washers and 3 dryers. Truck parking had openings even later in the evening.
Hope you like toenails, pubic hair, mold and spiders all around your shower room!

This was a nice place to stop. You can tell it's new. It was super clean. Everything was well stocked. Real friendly staff. The Manager was great, he went above and beyond to help us with our card so we could get a shower.

I fogged my thighs at the shower and realized that when I got at the truck after shower. I immediately returned and asked to open the shower so I could pick it up, to which I was told that there was already another client there and that ‚Ä¶

Good food, chill employees, truck stop as a whole super clean, showers super clean, however water is room temp shower... as someone with alot of hair, by the time the water gets thru your hair the water is cold by the time it hits the rest ‚Ä¶
The employee just walks around and not cleaning the shower waiting 2 hours for shower
Clean good customer service, good place to shower and take a break

Very helpful employees
Clean shower rooms

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ has been updated‚Ä¶ looks pretty good‚Ä¶ seems like they forgot to update the bathrooms and make it to where u can book a shower on the App‚Ä¶ as far as the parking goes‚Ä¶ good luck‚Ä¶ sure was a lot of trucks sitting that wasn‚Äôt occupied‚Ä¶ also ‚Ä¶
Best gas station I stopped by through my whole trip from FL to VA. it's clean, nice staff and they even have a shower, come on! Haha

‚Ä¶ "services " First thing look at the towels drivers have to use it looks like stuff I don't wants to used but have no other choice for now, some new truck stops are coming up, I try to use their shower sometimes when I'm in the area
Nice, clean place. Hot showers. The problem is the little red light that looks like a video camera in every shower room. I asked the staff about it and they just looked at me weird.

One of the cleanest pilots I‚Äôve been to inside and out and most importantly the shower area! Staff there is nice and friendly and considering some of the awful pilots I‚Äôve been to during my career the staff here needs a raise!!
Best place to stop get gas etc also in my opinion the people working there where. Nice and respect ful treated me. Good also you. Can pay to take a shower

Worst staff I went to take shower she said we have only one shower and you have to wait none was in showers I saw there are three showers but no body gave me key I waited for 1.5 hrs all there‚Äôs showers were empty
Small, not alot of spots. Staff is very friendly. Shower was clean and decent.  No laundry facility.
Shower was clean and hot, and staff was all great. Manager gal was awesome and the guy cleaning the showers did a great job
This is a very small Pilot with limited parking and 4 showers. Staff seemed nice, shower was just OK.

showerReviews.reviewText: Great Love's, convenient parking, nice and well maintained store area, super clean showers. A+
This gas station is incredibly clean and well-maintained. The staff are super friendly and welcoming. Thank you for the great service! ‚ô•Ô∏è
A new truck stop with spacious, clean showers, great coffee, and friendly, responsible staff. Highly recommend for a stop!

It don't matter which loves you go to there going to be a wait on fule or shower or rest room but not at t.a. and petro thay have 20 shower 15 or so fule pumps and 2 men's rooms loves you suck üëéüëé ‚Ä¶

Wish we could leave a better rating because the ladies were friendly, but the shower we paid $17 for was not clean. There is mold all in the shower. That tells me they are not cleaning. Bleach or Tilex will literally kill the mold. None of ‚Ä¶

Parking is great, plenty of spaces almost anytime and real easy to back into. Showers were hot, at first I didn‚Äôt think so until I put it on the cold side and it was hot. Staff very friendly and everything very clean!

Fairly new love's.  Bathrooms were clean and well stocked. Staff was beyond polite and cheerful. Good location on the way to Myrtle Beach. Plenty of parking and has a Hardee's attached which makes it all the more convenient.  Prices on gas were competitive.  Love's is starting to be my favorite truck stop in general
Nice and newer (as of 10/2023). Big shower rooms and laundry with 2 washers and 3 dryers. Truck parking had openings even later in the evening.

showerReviews.reviewText: Not a lot of parking showers not great but it's a shower it's $8 for the shower plus $8 deposit you might want to bring your own towel not as good as the big truck stops but it works and the staff is nice when I went in there was two very ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ It looks like they have two showers, and I would bring my own towel if I was desperate enough to shower there. ‚Ä¶
This is a smaller truck stop that fills quickly. The shower was pretty dirty and the cashiers talked on the phone the whole time I was waiting for towels and while they waited on customers.
Didn't shower or eat.... By the time I was able to actually find the place I was late for my drop. No signs or anything had to get directions from a local.
Polite & friendly staff and really clean shower . The towels looked and smelled very clean.
Good place for those who are traveling plus they have a laundry mat and shower
Clean shower nice staff
Very dirty bathroom and shower.
